9a.static binding 

package pavanm;
public class Exp9a {
void print()
{
System.out.println("in employee class");
}
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
Exp9a ob=new Exp9a();
ob.print();
	}

}


9b.dynamic binding.

package pavanm;

public class Exp9b {
void print()
{
System.out.println("In person class");
}
}
class student extends Exp9b
{
void print()
{
System.out.println("in student class");
}
}
class employee extends Exp9b{
	void print()
	{
System.out.println("in employee class");
	}
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
Exp9b ob1=new student();
ob1.print();
Exp9b ob2=new employee();
ob2.print();
	}
}


10a. Abstract class to archive abstraction.

package pavanm;
abstract class demo
{
abstract void display(); 
} 
public class Exp10a{
void display() 
{ 
System.out.println("Abstract method called"); 
} 
public static void main(String[] args) {

Exp10a obj=new Exp10a(); 
obj.display(); 
} 
} 


10b.interface to archive abstraction.

package pavanm;
interface carstart
{
	void start();

}
interface carstop
{
	void stop();
}
public class Exp10b
{
	public void start()
{
		System.out.println("car engine has been started");
}
	public void stop()
	{
		System.out.println("car engine has been stopped");
}
	public static void main(String[]args) {
		Exp10b c =new Exp10b();
		c.start(); c.stop();
	}}
